integer_list module¶

class integer_list.IntegerStatistics¶

Bases: list

An extension of the built in list data structure that stores at hand mehtods to calculate the mean and standard deviation of the elements

mean()¶
Returns:(decimal) mean of the list elements
stdev()¶
Returns:(decimal) standard deviation of the list elements
